Wasalu Muhammad Jaco better known as Lupe Fiasco rocked the NIU Convocation Center Tuesday night.The arena was packed with fans as Fiasco took the stage to perform songs from his new album Lasers PERIOD But the show wasnt all about Lasers.The tour marks.. PERIOD
